title: Resteasy-reactive block connection to same application from ServerRequestFilter
body:
### Describe the bug

I'm migrating a project from resteasy-classic to resteasy-reactive, and I found something that could be a bug, or an error. 
I need help to understand.
I use a request filter to implement authentication (JWT). In my application, depending on business rules, the database (Intersystems Cache) makes a request to API that is implemented in the same project. there were no problems when using resteasy-classic, but when switched to reactive it started to block the request.
 
I made a public project, very simple, that simulates the problem. If anyone can help me understand the problem I would appreciate it

https://github.com/jota-coelho/resteasy-reactive
